about_the_game:
This is full physics based, local 2 3 4 players funny mini party games for family or friends.

All you have to do is, click one button control and beat your friends!

- 35 Different Mini Party Games!

Challenge with your friends, This game contains polished mini games for tons of fun. Playable local games up to 4 players on same device.

You can play this game even if you don't have friend around you.



Game Features.

Including Games.

--Tanks
Control your battle tank and destroy all enemies. Each tank got only one life per round.
Last Stands Wins!

--Combat
Hide behind the boxes and hit opponents. For the aim assist laser tag attached to the guns.
Destroy everything!

--Soccer
Beat your friends in a funny soccer game!
-First to 3 Wins!

--Racing
Be the fastest.

--Monster Trucks
Crush everything and go to the finish line.

--MotoCross
Be the fastest for win.

--Chicken Catch
Grab the chickens on the floor and put them to the your stash!
1 Minute game time!

--Money Steal
Grab a money bag and throw to the your boat.
Top scorer wins!




--Catch the Fish
Show your reflexes off. Catch the green fishes and avoid the red ones.
First to 3 wins!

--Push Cars
Tap the button as fast as you can in order to reach the finish line.
Be quick!

--Knock Out
Push down your friends and try to stay stand on cliffs.

--Run Away
Run through from the giant rocks!

--War Ships
Destroy everything.

--Basketball
Grab a ball and throw to your basket.

--Farm
Visit the field and grow plants.

--Parking
Park at the marked park spaces.

--Camping
Gather the wood on the ground and throw it into your own fire.

--Rescue Helicopters
Rescue People and Do not crash other helicopters.

--Cross Street
Try to get in the bus at first place.

--Sumos
Run without going out in arena and try to push you opponents out!
Stay in circle!

--Runner
Test your timing skills, avoid all blocks, reach the finish line as winner!
Don't get behind!

And more games. A total of 35 games.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 with 3,1 GHz or AMD FX-8150 with 3,6 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti (2 GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon RX 460 (2 GB VRAM) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3820 with 3,6 GHz or AMD FX-8350 with 4,0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (4 GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon RX 570 (4 GB VRAM) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In this physics-based party game, 2-4 players can compete across 35 different mini-games. Try to beat your friends with just one button and get the fun started!
supported_languages: English, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish
